| HistoryText             = Shadowforce was a team of convicted criminals turned government agents who were given superhuman powers through the Shadowforce process, developed by Project: Homegrown on the basis of data from the [[Fantastic Four (Earth-616)|Fantastic Four]], [[Steven Rogers (Earth-616)|Captain America]], the [[Bruce Banner (Earth-616)|Hulk]] and others. They were sent after Spider-Man by General Sharpe.{{Citation}}
